Title: Severe Weather Alert: Heavy Rain & Flash Flooding Risk
Description: The South African Weather Service predicts heavy rainfall (50-100mm) and strong winds for the uMhlanga and Durban North areas, posing a risk of flash flooding, especially in low-lying informal settlements and coastal roads. Residents are advised to avoid unnecessary travel, secure outdoor furniture, and not cross flooded bridges or roads. The municipal disaster management center is on high alert.

Title: Grand Diwali Night Market & Fair
Description: Experience the lights, food, and music of our annual Diwali market. Authentic Indian cuisine, fireworks, live performances, and family-friendly activities.

Title: Pinetown Main Road Night Closure
Description: Pinetown Main Road (R103) was successfully closed overnight for essential pothole patching and line marking. The work was completed ahead of schedule, ensuring minimal disruption to morning traffic flow. Thank you to commuters for adhering to the detour routes.

Title: Emergency Water Interruption: Umhlanga Rocks Drive
Description: Residents and businesses in the areas surrounding Umhlanga Rocks Drive and Portland Drive will experience a planned emergency water supply interruption due to a major burst pipe repair. Please store water.

Title: Basic Computer & Internet Skills for Seniors
Description: A four-week course aimed at providing older residents with essential digital literacy, email, and safe internet browsing skills. Classes held every Tuesday and Thursday.

Title: Berea Water Pipe Replacement Project Complete
Description: The municipality successfully completed the scheduled water pipe replacement project in the Berea area. All services have been restored, and road resurfacing is complete. We thank residents for their patience during this necessary infrastructure upgrade which ensures long-term water stability in the area.

Title: Invitation to Tender: Supply & Maintenance of Municipal IT Infrastructure
Description: The Municipality seeks experienced service providers for a three-year contract to supply and maintain all public-facing IT and networking infrastructure. Mandatory briefing session on Nov 10th.

Title: Annual Spring Art & Sculpture Festival
Description: Join us for a weekend celebrating local artists! Featuring live painting, sculpture displays, and a craft market. All proceeds support the local arts community.

Title: Youth Skills Workshop: Digital Marketing Basics
Description: Our three-day intensive workshop focused on providing local youth with foundational digital marketing skills, including social media management, basic SEO, and content creation. The workshop was a huge success, equipping attendees with tools for future employment and entrepreneurship.

Title: Full Road Closure: Pinetown CBD Resurfacing
Description: The main arterial road through Pinetown CBD will be closed between St. John's Avenue and Josiah Gumede Road for a full resurfacing project. Expect major delays; alternative routes are strongly advised.

Title: Kingsburgh Coastal Clean-Up and Recycling Day
Description: Join the municipality and local volunteers to clean the beach and host a community-wide recycling drop-off. Free gloves and bags provided.

Title: Public Hearing: 2026/2027 Draft Municipal Budget
Description: The Council invites all residents to a public participation meeting to review and provide input on the proposed municipal budget for the upcoming financial year. Your voice matters!

Title: Bluff Beach 5km Fun Run and Walk
Description: Lace up for a non-competitive 5km run/walk along the picturesque Bluff coastline. Free entry, all ages welcome! Registration opens at 6:30 AM.

Title: Scheduled Power Outage: Folweni Substation Maintenance
Description: Essential maintenance will result in a planned power outage impacting all areas serviced by the Folweni substation. Please switch off sensitive electrical equipment.

Title: Guided Tour: Inchanga Heritage Rail Restoration
Description: Join the Historical Preservation Society for a guided walk and talk detailing the ongoing restoration of the historic Inchanga Railway Station. Learn about the town's industrial past.

Title: New Noise By-Law Effective December 1st
Description: Following extensive consultation, the new Municipal Noise Pollution By-Law is officially gazetted. It mandates quieter hours and sets stricter penalties for non-compliance in residential areas.

Title: Workshop: Navigating Municipal Business Licenses & Permits
Description: A free session for new and existing business owners on the correct procedures and documentation required to obtain municipal operating licenses and permits quickly and efficiently.

Title: Beach Warning: Increased Shark Activity at Amanzimtoti
Description: Due to recent sightings and adverse sea conditions, a temporary ban on swimming and surfing is in effect. All beachgoers are advised to adhere to lifeguard instructions.
